catalog_info.title: Clinical Aspects of Hearing and Speech
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with HST 724 at MIT. Classes to be held at the Massachusetts Eye and Ear Infirmary (MEEI)
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Anatomy of Speech and Hearing, Acoustics of Speech and Hearing or permission of the course director
catalog_info.description: Clinical approach to speech and hearing disorders as practiced by physicians, audiologists, speech clinicians, rehabilitation specialists, bioengineers. Includes observation of patient care in clinic and operating room, audiology/balance disorders experience, lectures and discussion groups.
